profile.title: Profile
profile.p: Front-end web developer, experienced with large variety of web technologies. Based out of Maryland/ Virginia/ Washington DC Metropolitan area. Specialties include responsive web design, high quality UI/ UX building, and on-time delivery of projects & assignments.

education.title: Education
education.p: University of Maryland, Baltimore County. Bachelor of Science in Computer Science 2016. Concentration in Web Development

section.info: JavaScript, CSS, Sass/LESS, HTML, JSON, AJAX
Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office, Adobe Acrobat, Terminal, ATOM, Sublime Text 3, Compass
Agile workflows, SCRUM framework, responsive web design, UI/UX design

duties: Designed and created responsive features and pages to branch website using AngularJS, HTML, and CSS
Crafted high quality components using in-line, CSS3, and Bootstrap—in accordance with best practices
Resolved technical issues by efficiently troubleshooting code, utilizing Node.js, and accessing every available knowledgebase
Effectively prioritized between multiple web development and maintenance projects
Practiced SCRUM methodology alongside our Creative Director and instructional team
Worked with Lead Developer & Creative Director to create the best user-experience for our company’s online presence
Quickly handled expedited requests and deadlines using Agile program management<
Enhanced the visual presentation of the content & layouts of our company website by unit and integration testing every update
Updated content, graphics, and code when assisting in managing email blast programs
Effectively articulated programming foundations & techniques to young audiences
Enriched problem-solving skills of students while aiding them in the development of their own projects & games
Presented comprehensive lessons to large classrooms of students with varying degrees of skills
Created an organized curriculum covering a broad range of programming techniques with a team of instructors
